00092   if ( $e_type == 'deb' ) {
00093     $get='jrn_def_fiche_deb';
00094     $list_fiche=get_list_fiche($cn,$get,$_GET['p_jrn']);
00095     $sql="select * from vw_fiche_attr where fd_id in ( $list_fiche )";
00096   }
00097   if ( $e_type == 'cred' ) {
00098     $get='jrn_def_fiche_cred';

00100     $sql="select * from vw_fiche_attr where fd_id in ( $list_fiche )";
00101   }
00102 
00103 
00104   // if e_type contains a list of value
00105   if ( $e_type != 'cred' and $e_type != 'deb')     {
00106     $list_fiche=$e_type;
00107     $sql="select * from vw_fiche_attr where frd_id in ( $list_fiche )";
00108     //    $sql="select * from vw_fiche_attr ";
00109   }
00110 // e_fic_search contains the pattern
00111

00113     $Res=ExecSql($cn,$sql); 
00114   } else {
00115     $Res=ExecSql($cn,"$sql and upper(vw_name) like upper('%$e_fic_search%')"); 
00116   }
00117 
00118   // Test whether rows are returned
00119  if ( ($Max = pg_NumRows($Res) ) == 0 ) {
00120    echo_warning("Pas de fiche trouvée");
00121    return;
00122  } 
00123  // Show the cards

00125

00127
